name: market for router, internet | router, internet | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/4525/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'router, internet', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;This is a mobile infrastructure, representing the product of a router that is used provide internet. Its production represents a Cisco Service Router 1800 Series, having a maximal data rate of 100 Mbit/s and a realistic data rate of 25 Mbit/s. Its power demand is 0.0042 kW at 1 Mbit/s and a lifetime of 6 years. It includes all materials necessary to construct it and energy consumption during manufacturing.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'router, internet',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of 'router, internet',  to the consumers of this product. Transport is included. Product losses during transportation are assumed negligible and are therefore not included.
